statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC, unit_price ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity >= 20 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 AND price <= 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 AND price <= 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT w.name, w.location, i.quantity FROM warehouses w JOIN inventory i ON w.id = i.warehouse_id;
SELECT o.id, p.name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id WHERE o.status = 'shipped' ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;
SELECT name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity > 0 AND inventory.warehouse_id = 1
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC

SELECT products.name, warehouses.name AS warehouse_name, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id JOIN warehouses ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouses.id
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM orders LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT c.name, o.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id WHERE o.quantity > 10 ORDER BY c.name, o.quantity DESC;
SELECT w.location, SUM(p.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses w LEFT JOIN products p ON w.id = p.warehouse_id GROUP BY w.location HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
